name: Israeli Salad

ingredients.name: medium cucumbers
ingredients.original_string: 2 medium cucumbers, peeled, seeded, and finely diced

ingredients.name: medium green bell pepper
ingredients.original_string: 1 medium green bell pepper, finely diced

ingredients.name: juice of 1/2 to 1 lemon, or
ingredients.original_string: Juice of 1/2 to 1 lemon, or to taste

ingredients.name: salt and freshly ground pepper
ingredients.original_string: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

instructions: Combine the ingredients in a serving container and toss well. If time allows, let the salad stand at room temperature for 30 minutes or so before serving.
